content.prompt: Evidence in the excerpt best corroborates which of the following broader historical contexts?

choices.label: Expanded trade between the East and West Coasts and with Asia divided the country in new ways.
Abolitionist activity undermined the ability of new territories to achieve statehood.
Southern states sought more proslavery seats in the United States Congress.
New political parties such as the Know-Nothings threatened the system of slavery.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
